Title: Relates to required coursework and training in reporting cases of suspected child abuse
Summary: Requires certain persons and officials required to report suspected child abuse and maltreatment to complete ongoing training.
LawCode: Amd §§6507, 3003 & 3004, Ed L; amd §413, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the social services law, in relation to coursework or training regarding the identification and reporting of suspected cases of child abuse and maltreatment
